abstract: As Apple’s line of Mac computers has staged a comeback, more customers have asked that Autodesk make its flagship product available on the platform again.
snippet: As Apple’s line of Mac computers has staged a comeback, more customers have asked that Autodesk make its flagship product available on the platform again.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  When it comes to Apple products, the iPad and the iPhone get all the headlines.

headline.main: Autodesk Will Reintroduce Its AutoCAD Design Software for Macs
headline.print_headline: Autodesk Will Reintroduce Its AutoCAD Design Software for Macs
